  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.media.AudioManager.OnAudioFocusChangeListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnBufferingUpdateListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnInfoListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnSeekCompleteListener

extends android.app.Service
